name: Freddy Run 1
description:
Freddy Run 1 is a spooky running platform game featuring a young boy that loves to play video games all day long. Yet as night comes and Freddy goes to sleep he has a terrifying nightmare of him being trapped inside a haunted castle and constantly chased by an evil monster aka the Soul Catcher. Trying to escape his chaser and survive his nightmare Freddy also needs to avoid other incoming enemies as well as all sort of deadly traps. 

In total there are 5 levels you need to complete in order to finish the game, yet be warned that in every stage, at some point The Soul Catcher will attack you by using his sharp scythe trying to knock you down from behind.  In order to survive his attacks you need to carefully observe when he pulls back the weapon preparing to attack and perform a long jump in order to avoid it.
